text:
After 1,000+ hours of testing & experimenting,
my list of AI for videos, from best to worst:

1. Google Veo 3 - https://gemini.google.com/
- Best model to follow your prompt instructions.

2. Kinetix - https://www.kinetix.tech/
- The best model to control the camera in 3D

3. Kling 2.5: https://lnkd.in/eB5fjyhd. 
- The most creative model for image-to-video.

4. Hailuo - https://hailuoai.video/
- Good prompt adherence, physics, consistency.

5. Pixverse: https://lnkd.in/gyJscdqN
- Good attention to detail and gets physics right. 

6. Midjourney - midjourney.com 
- The best model to make image (not video).

7. Luma AI - https://lumalabs.ai/
- They released 'Ray-3', but I couldn’t make it work. 

8. Moonvalley - https://lnkd.in/g5QESH7W
- A new player, but still not convincing.

9. OpenAI Sora - https://sora.chatgpt.com/ 
- The hype was real. But it did not live up to it. 

I made a blog where I test all of them. Read the full breakdown here: https://lnkd.in/d4UQkppd
